advert.headline: 2 Bed Duplex – Marina View | Gateway Al Zorah
advert.description: Experience elegant waterfront living with this spacious 2-bedroom duplex at Gateway Al Zorah. Featuring 2301 sqft of premium space and uninterrupted marina views. Handover expected by December 2026. 50/50 payment plan available.

advert.headline: 2 Bed Duplex – Marina View | Gateway Al Zorah
advert.description: Stylish 2-bedroom duplex with 2282 sqft of space in the exclusive Gateway Al Zorah community. Enjoy marina views, flexible payment options, and an anticipated handover in December 2026.
